version.name: Fabulous Food 1Malaysia
version.short-description: This event allows food lovers from nationwide to savour not only the tropical Malaysian food but food all...
version.description: This event allows food lovers from nationwide to savour not only the tropical Malaysian food but food all over the world. It also includes the Malaysian International Gourmet Festival, Asean Food Heritage Trail and Street Food Festival.

version.name: 2nd KL - PJ Wedding Fair 2010
version.short-description: In search of your once in a lifetime fairy tale wedding? Then come to the Eternal Wedding Fair. Plan the perfect wedding...
version.description:
In search of your once in a lifetime fairy tale wedding? Then come to the 2nd KL - PJ Wedding Fair 2010 from Friday Sept 17to Sun 19, 2010 at the Mid Valley Exhibition Centre. Plan the perfect wedding from the various exhibitors taking part.

This is an event that supplies a complimentary peek at the pre-screened best of the best in the wedding industry in Malaysia, mainly Kuala Lumpur and Petaling Jaya. The organizer has searched high and low to compile an extensive group of event professionals who have been cordially invited to display their works based on style, experience, and impeccable reputation in their fields of expertise, and of course good proven track records.

For more info, please visit www.yahoobrides.com.

version.name: Jog For Hope 2010
version.short-description: The Tree Huggers Club of Taylor's College Sri Hartamas will be organising a charity run on the 18th of July, 2010. This run is organised to raise funds to support basic education facilities for the children in Bario, Sarawak. In addition to that, funds will also be contributed to Malaysia Paws Animal Welfare Society (PAWS).
version.description:
The Tree Huggers Club of Taylor's College Sri Hartamas will be organising a charity run on the 18th of July, 2010. This run is organised to raise funds to support basic education facilities for the children in Bario, Sarawak. In addition to that, funds will also be contributed to Malaysia Paws Animal Welfare Society (PAWS).

These are details regarding this fund-raising event:
Date  : 18th July 2010
Time  : 6am (registration), 8am (flag off)
Venue : Entrance of Taylors College Sri Hartamas

Distance :
School (males), school (females), college (male), college (females) - 6 km
Open (males), open (females) - 9 km

Registration fee:
School category - RM15
College category- RM20
Open category   - RM30

Further detail, please visit jogforhope.wordpress.com/

or www.facebook.com/event.php
